name: BACKSPACE - Return to planet Figadore
description: It's 50 years since humans first went to the moon, now we are planning to go back the Reguliths need to escape before we find them. They are invading planet Figadore in the Hercules cluster. Fred has been kidnapped by the aliens. Play as his sister Jade and race to get the planet back and prevent the Regulith spreading a deadly infection.
